carpet.rule.optimizedRandom.desc: Replaces Math.Random with a more optimized Random implementation. It seems to still be true to vanilla
carpet.rule.cursedOptimizedRandom.desc: Replaces some logic with Random that MAY BREAK STUFF!!! **Requires optimizedRandom enabled
carpet.rule.optimizedPortalCollisions.de: Removes checking bounding box sizes of large mobs. It significantly reduces lag on portal-based farms
carpet.rule.optimizedRandomCUDA.desc: Replaces Math.Random with a CUDA-accelerated alternative. Restart required! For Nvidia GPUs only! **Requires optimizedRandom enabled
carpet.rule.optimizedEntityTicking.desc: Optimizes certain parts of the entity ticking code
carpet.rule.cursedLagFreeSpawning.desc: Completely breaks mob spawning for performance
carpet.rule.cursedFastMath.desc: Breaks Minecraft's math system for performance
